explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper discusses a distributed model multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL) based energy management system (EMS), which involves reinforcement learning techniques to optimize charging decisions and coordination.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of Distributed Q-Learning (DQL) and W-Learning (WL) algorithms, which are part of the broader neural network and reinforcement learning methodologies.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed system involves advanced learning techniques that can be categorized under deep learning, especially given the complexity and real-time decision-making requirements.
